Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from the area of Forest Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from the area of Forest Park.

We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
